general_info:
This guide is intended to get a 5-man group from level 60 to 70 in the most efficient way:

• to level 70 by generally avoiding leveling in the open world;
• to obtain all heroic keys
• to obtain the Shadow Labyrinth, Shattered Halls, and Arcatraz keys
• to attune to Karazhan
• to summon Nightbane in first raid ID

General Tips:
• the group's professions should cover herbalism and mining to gather resources within dungeons, enchanting to disenchant unneeded blues and greens to save space and gather enchanting materials, and tailoring to turn cloth into bolts to save space
• bring a few pieces of hit gear for when you start missing mobs again in the mid-60s. More hit = faster clears
• study your group's pre-raid BIS lists and adjust route to obtain pre-raid BIS items if there's wiggle room
• Going back to Orgrimmar every level could be a time waster. Each class should carefully review their new spells to decide whether it's worth taking a break to learn new abilities at 61, 63, 65 etc. If you must go back to Org, take advantage of ghetto hearth in RFC to get back quickly

Disclaimer:
This info was stolen from many different online resources and content creators. This is what I believe to be the best route based on their collective work and resources.

Published data on experience per dungeon run is wildly inconsistent. Actual number of runs to reach next level may vary (and for that reason are rarely discussed).

For best results, the group should be AQ40/Naxx appropriately geared when it goes through the Dark Portal

route.name:
Pick up and complete the following travel quests:
• Through the Dark Portal
• Arrival in Outland
• Journey to Trallmar
• Report to Nazgrel
• Eradicate the Burning Legion
route.notes:
Pre-Quests for Hellfire Ramparts

Set hearthstone to Thrallmar
route.rewards:
• 2,400 exp / 250 Thrallmar rep
• 2,400 exp / 250 Thrallmar rep
• 2,400 exp / 250 Thrallmar rep
• 4,750 exp
• 970 exp / 250 Thrallmar rep

route.name: Felspark Ravine
route.notes:
Pre-Quest for Hellfire Rampart
• Note: This is an open world quest that will be contested, but it is worth it. Spending ~10 minutes at most to get all the mob tags needed with a 5-man group opens up more than 100k free exp (and a bunch of rep) in dungeon quests along our route. Spend 10 minutes now to save 1 hour later.

route.name: Hellfire Ramparts
route.notes: Do only one run to complete "Weaken the Ramparts." Do not go back to Thrallmar to turn in quest yet

route.name: Dark Tidings
route.notes: Loot from boss in Hellfire Ramparts. Do not go back to Thrallmar to turn in quest yet.

route.name: Dark Tidings
route.notes: Turn in (pre-req for The Blood of Life)

route.name: The Underbog
route.notes:
Repeat until you are 5,999/6,000 rep and ding 62
• Kill all Slaves before the Masters
• Complete the Underbog portion of "Lost in Action" and turn in while still 62
• Note: Save all Sanguine Hibiscus for later for Sporegarr rep, and save Unidentified Plant Parts to donate to guildies or sell on the auction house
route.rewards: • ~ 46,473 exp / 850 Cenarion Expedition rep per run

route.name: Aldor or Scryer
route.notes:
Choose your faction
• Note: you don't need to follow the summoned add around - you can just wait at quest turn-in
• Note: turning in Fel Armaments/Arcane Tomes etc. grants Sha'tar reputation up to 5,999/6,000 friendly. You may be able to reduce the number of dungeon runs needed to reach revered if you turn in Aldor/Scryer rep items now. This probably will not make a noticable difference because alot of pre-bis is found in the Sha'tar dungeons so you'll likely be running them anyway

route.name: Orgrimmar
route.notes: Portal to Org for Class Trainer

route.name: Slave Pens
route.notes:
Do only one run to complete the Slave Pens portion of "Lost in Action"
• Note: Save all Unidentified Plant Parts to donate to guildies or sell on the auction house

route.name: The Underbog
route.notes:
Repeat until you ding 63. 
• Kill all Slaves before the Masters
• Complete the Underbog portion of "Lost in Action" and turn in while still 62
• Note: Save all Sanguine Hibiscus for later for Sporegarr rep, and save Unidentified Plant Parts to donate to guildies or sell on the auction house
route.rewards:
• 22,000 exp / 500 Cenarion Expedition
• 45,011 exp per run

route.name: Orgrimmar
route.notes: Portal to Org for Class Trainer

route.name: Mana Tombs
route.notes: Repeat until you will ding 65 after you hand in "Undercutting the Competition," "Safety Is Job One," and "Someone Else's Hard Work Pays Off." In other words, if you finish a run and have less than 67,800 exp until level, do not do another run. Instead turn the 3 quests in. If you have more than 67,800 exp until level, do one more run and then turn the quets in

route.name: Someone Else's Hard Work Pays Off
route.notes: Pick up & complete - escort quest inside MT

route.name: Auchenai Crpyts
route.notes: Do only one run to complete "Everything Will Be Alright"

route.name: Orgrimmar
route.notes: Portal to Org for Class Trainer

route.name:
Stonebreaker Hold

Shattrath City
route.notes:
Hearth back

Mages can now cast portals to Shattrath City. Take portal if you have a mage

route.name:
Pick up and complete the following quests:
• The Ring of Blood: Brokentoe
• The Ring of Blood: Rokdar the Sundered Lord
• The Ring of Blood: Skra'gath
• The Ring of Blood: The Blue Brothers
• The Ring of Blood: The Warmaul Champion
• The Ring of Blood: The Final Challenge
Sethekk Halls
route.rewards: • 40, 688 exp / 1139 Lower City rep per run

route.name: Brother Against Brother
route.notes:
Pick up & complete
• Note: Only turn in after 5,999/6,000 rep (at 66)

route.name:
Stonebreaker Hold

Shattrah City
route.notes:
Hearth back to Stonebreaker Hold and fly to Shattrath City

Mages can now cast portals to Shattrath City. Take portals if you have a mage

route.name: Archmage Alturus
route.notes: Pick up in Shattrath City and turn in outside Karazhan

route.name: Orgrimmar
route.notes: Portal to Org for Class Trainer

route.name: Auction House
route.notes:
Buy the following for Shattered Halls key later:
• 4 fel iron bars
• 2 arcane dust
• 4 motes of fire
Leave in mailbox until needed

route.name: Nice Hat....
route.notes: Pick up at Gadgetzhan Graveyard. Complete in OHB and turn in before going back to Outland

route.name:
Pick up and complete the following quests:
• To the Master's Lair
• The Caverns of Time
route.notes:
Pre-Quests for Old Hillsbrad Foothills
• Note: you don't need to follow the summon add around - you can just wait at quest turn-in
route.rewards:
• 1,150 exp / 10 Keepers of Time rep
• 1,200 exp / 250 Keepers of Time rep

route.name: The Caverns of Time
route.notes: Pick up & complete (same name as previous quest but this one is completed in OHB)

route.name: Escape from Durnholde
route.notes: Pick up & complete - escort quest inside OHB

route.name: Old Hillsbrad Foothills
route.notes: Do only one run to complete Nice Hat... and the four previous quests, and to attune for Black Morass

route.name: The Opening of the Dark Portal
Black Morass
route.notes: Do only one run. Will come back later for Karazhan attunement quest chain

route.name:
Stonebreaker Hold

Shattrath City
route.notes:
Hearth back and fly to Shattrath

Mages can now cast portals to Shattrath City. Take portal if you have a mage

route.name: Entry Into Karazhan
route.notes: Pick up & go to Shadow Labyrinth

route.name: Trouble at Auchindoun
route.notes: Pick up in Shattrath and complete outside Sethekk Halls entrance

route.name: The Codex of Blood
route.notes: Pick up outside Sethekk Halls and complete inside Shadow Labyrinth

route.name: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth
route.notes: Pick up inside Shadow Labyrinth and kill Murmur. Turn quest in at Shattrath City after last Shadow Labyrinth run

route.name: The Soul Devices
route.notes: Pick up inside Shadow Labyrinth. Turn quest in at Shattrath City after last Shadow Labyrinth run

route.name: Shadow Labyrinth
route.notes:
Key is behind Murmur. Complete 6 runs to hit revered

Shadow Labyrinth notable loot:
• Spellstrike Pants recipe
• Idol of Emerald Queen
• Adamantine Figurine
• Sonic Spear
• Broach of Heightened Potential
route.rewards: • 54,504 exp / 2012 Lower City rep per run

route.name:
Stonebreaker Hold

Shattrath City
route.notes:
Hearth back then fly to Shattrath City

Mages can now cast portals to Shattrath City. Take portal if you have a mage

route.name: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth
The Warlord's Hideout
route.notes: Pick up & complete quest outside Steamvaults

route.name: Orders from Lady Vash
route.notes: Pick up from random drop within Steamvaults. During trip back to Cenarion Refuge turn in. This will allow you to pick up Coilfang Armaments in Steamvaults moving forward

route.name: Steamvaults
route.notes:
• Kill all Slaves before the Masters die
• Key is in the water before the first boss
• Complete 7 runs to hit revered
•Note: Unidentified Plant Parts and Coilfang Armaments will not reduce the # of runs we need to run to hit revered, so we will not bother with them. Donate Unidentified Plant Parts to guildies or sell them on the auction hosue. Turn in Coilfang Armaments if seeking exalted with the Cenerarion Expedition, otherwise just sell on the auction house

Steamvaults notable loot:
• Incantor's Pauldrons
• Scintilating Coral Band
• Serpantcrest Lifestaff
• Beast Lord Mantle
• Beast Lord Leggings
route.rewards: • 43,693 exp / 1796 Cenarion Expedition rep per run

route.name: Entry Into the Citadel
route.notes:
Pick up by killing Smith Gorlunk at left side of Black Temple, and turn in at Thrallmar
• This is the start of the questline to obtain the Shattered Halls key

route.name: Thrallmar
route.notes: Get your fel iron bars, arcane dust, and motes of fire out of the mailbox in preperation to complete the next quest

route.name: Hotter Than Hell
route.notes:
Pick up & complete by killing a Fel Reaver
• Note: You DO NOT need to actually kill the Fel Reaver. If there's a dead one on the ground, plunge the quest item into its corpse and yonu will complete the quest

route.name: Shattered Halls
route.notes:
Complete 6-7 runs to hit revered

Shattered Halls notable loot:
• Spellstrike Hood recipe
• Beast Lord Handguards
• Greathelm of the Unbreakable
• Figurine of the Colossus
• Runesong Dagger

route.name: *** DEALER'S CHOICE *** -- Your group should decide whether to grind Steamvaults, Shattered Halls, or Shadow Labyrinth until 70. Examine your group's pre-bis lists and decide which dungeon is worth running, either because of Exalted reputation rewards or boss drops. The Black Morass is terrible exp per run so the last few runs until revered should be saved until we're level 70 and headed back there to complete Kara attunement (this also saves us an extra trip to and from COT. We're not going to begin the Arcatraz key questline yet because it involves alot of open world questing and traveling to and around Netherstorm is a pain without a flying mount. We'll complete the key questline and the Sha'tar dungeons at level 70 after we've bought flying mounts. Set hearthstone for whichever dungeon hub you choose.
Orgrimmar
route.notes: Portal to Org for Class Trainer

route.name:
Thrallmar/Cenarion Refuge/Stonebreaker Hold

Shattrath City
route.notes:
Hearth back

Mages can now cast portals to Shattrath City. Take portal if you have a mage

route.name: Assisting the Consortium
route.notes:
Pick up & complete in Area 52
• This is the start of the questline to obtain the Arcatraz Key

Note: If you have a mage, set your hearth to Area 52.

route.name: Special Delivery to Shattrath City
route.notes:
Pick up in Netherstorm and complete in Shattrath City

Note: if you do not have a mage, set your hearth to Shattrath City

route.name: How to Break Into the Arcatraz
Area 52/TK Dungeons
route.notes: Hearth to Area 52 if hearth is set there. Otherwise fly directly to TK dungeons

route.name: The Mechanar
route.notes: Top half of key drops off final boss

route.name: The Botanica
route.notes: Bottom half of key drops off final boss

route.name: How to Break Into the Arcatraz
Harbringer of Doom
route.notes: Pick up & kill final boss of Arcatraz

route.name: The Black Morass
route.notes:
Run until revered, should be five runs

Black Morass notable loot:
• Legplates of the Bold
• Mantle of Three Terrors
• Hourglass of the Unraveller
• Scarab of the Infinite Cycle
• Mana-etched Crown

route.name: KEEPERS OF TIME REVERED - HEROICS ATTUNED
Return to Khadgar
route.notes: Turn in quest in Shattrath City

route.name:
*** DEALER'S CHOICE *** -- If you haven't been turning in Fel Armaments/Arcane Tomes etc., you should be around 4,750/6,000 into friendly with the Sha'tar. You have three options to increase your reputation to revered:

• run the Mechanar for 1,150 Sha'tar rep per run
• run the Botanica for 1,950 Sha'tar rep per run
• run the Arcatraz for 1,150 Sha'tar rep per run

You should look at your group's pre-bis list and decide which dungeons to run. Repeat until you reach revered
route.notes:
The Mechanar notable loot:
• Cosmic Lifeband
• Manual of the Necromancer
• Jade Skull Breastplate
• Beast Lord Helm
• Incantor's Cowl
• Abacus of Violent Odds

The Botanica notable loot:
• Whitemend Hood recipe
• Beast Lord Curiass
• Incantor's Robes
• Aeigis of the Sunbird
• Warhelm of the Bold

The Arcatraz notable loot:
• Whitemend Pants recipe
• Breastplate of the Bold
• Sigil-laced Boots
• Lamp of Peaceful Radiance
• Belt of Depravity

route.name:
*** Week 1 Nightbane Attunement *** 

You must be honored with the Violet Eye to begin the Nightbane attunement. At this point, you should be around 2,355/3000 into neutral. To get to honored, run a full Karazhan run but SKIP SHADE OF ARAN (~6,000 Violet Eye rep). During that run, complete the following quests that can be found in and around Karazhan:

• The Violet Eye (75 Violet Eye rep)
• Assessing the Situation (250 Violet Eye rep)
• Keanna's Log (250 Violet Eye rep)
• A Demonic Presence (250 Violet Eye rep)
• The New Directive (3,000 Violet Eye rep)

Now that you're honored, go outside and pick up the quest "Medivh's Journal." Go back inside to complete the quest (250 Violet Eye rep), and complete the following quests that involve talking to NPCs in Karazhan:

• In Good Hands (10Violet Eye rep)
• Kamis (10 Violet Eye rep)

Next, pick up the quest "The Shade of Aran" and complete it by killing the Shade of Aran (250 Violet Eye rep). 

Before zoning out, pick up and complete the quest "The Master's Terrace."

Go outside to turn in the quest "The Master's Terrace" (250 Violet Eye rep).

Drop raid, and pick up and complete the quest "Digging up the Past" (250 Violet Eye rep).

Pick up the quest "A Colleague's Aid" and turn it in at Area 52 (75 Violet Eye rep).

Pick up the quest "Kalynna's Request" in Area 52. This requires you to kill the first bosses in both Heroic Shattered Halls and Heroic Sethekk Halls. Return to Area 52 to turn the quest in (250 Violet Eye rep).

Finally, pick up the quest "Nightbane" in Area 52. Go back to Karazhan as part of a raid, summon and kill Nightbane, loot the Faint Arcane Essence from his corpse, and turn the quest in outside to receive the Blackened Urn to summon Nightbane each week (3,000 Violet Eye rep).

*** Closing Thoughts on Nightbane ***

I recommend completing the Karazhan run (sans Nightbane) on your team's first raid night. I also recommend that each member of the 10-man team complete the questchain together so that more people can summon Nightbane and you're not reliant on one or two people always showing up to kill Nightbane. Between raid night 1 and raid night 2, the 10-man team should split into 2 teams of 5 and go run both Heroic Shattered Halls and Heroic Sethekk Halls to complete the Nightbane pre-quest. Finally, I recommend that the full 25-man raid team kill Gruul's Lair and Magtharidon's Lair on raid night 2, and then your team go back into Karazhan after to kill Nightbane.

Congratulations, you've beaten WOW TBC Anniverary Phase 1 in less than a week.
